calculateStakingLastReward(uint256).details: Calculates service staking reward starting from the last checkpoint period.

returns.reward: Service reward for the on-going epoch.

calculateStakingReward(uint256).details: Calculates overall service staking reward at current timestamp.

checkpoint().details: Checkpoint to allocate rewards up until a current time.

returns._2: Corresponding set of reward-eligible service rewards.

claim(uint256).details: Claims service rewards with additional checkpoint call.

getNextRewardCheckpointTimestamp().details: Gets the next reward checkpoint timestamp.

getNumServiceIds().details: Gets number of staked service Ids.

returns.sInfo: Struct object with the corresponding service info.

unstake(uint256).details: Unstakes the service with collected reward, if available.

calculateStakingLastReward(uint256).notice: If this function returns a nonzero value, call checkpoint in order to get the full reward.
